en.title: FusionExcel's Achievers Recognition Dinner, Manila, 18th July 2009.
en.content:
REPORT BY FE PHILIPPINES COUNTRY LICENSEE JEREMY LOOI. 

FE's recent Achievers Recognition Dinner at Gloria Maris Restaurant, Manila was a GREAT SUCCESS attended by many Leaders, Members, VIPs and Invited Guests. 

Highlights Of The Event Include:

- Opening by MCs Dr Anarie Reyes and ED Efren Fortuna who again showed us their brilliance in hosting the
  event by bringing cheers, laughter and excitement to everyone who attended. 

- Great music & entertainment for the evening was provided by the dynamic band EXPO. 

- Opening Speech by Jeremy Looi who recently won the 2nd Top Country Licensee Award. Jeremy took the
  opportunity to give his heartfelt thanks to all and said the Award was achieved through the diligence and
  synergy of every distributor in the Philippines and he thanked the several pillars within his organization,
  especially Presidential Director Pastor Arthur Medina. 

- "Never Give Up!" , "If you give the people what they want they will give you what you want” FE's Founder
  Director KS Lee quoted Zig Ziglar, in his speech . 

- Prof. Dr. Romero Macalinao shared about his book “SCALAR ENERGY HEALING POTENTIAL” to an attentive
  audience. 

- PD Pastor Art Medina joined Prof Dr Romer on the stage and led the people to FE's standard battle cry
  “AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!!“ Well done, Art , you are truly inspirational! 

- Two PBA Legends and FE Spokesmen, Allan Caidic and Samboy Lim demonstrated the effectiveness of
  FE's amazing products to the audience. As expected, the four people who lifted Samboy Lim who weighs
  200 pounds were bewildered just like all the other invited guests . FE products simply never fail to amaze
  people! 

- Installation of new Directors. Congratulations! 

- Installation of new Executive Directors. Congratulations! 

- Installation of 3 new Presidential Directors, Erickson Erico, Gloria Cueresma and Nathan Demasillo.
  Congratulations! 

- "I believe that success does not just come in skills or names. I believe that success always starts from
  the internal stamina. It is the passion and how deep your reason is to do the business" says Nathan
  Demasillo in his PD speech which fired up the audience. 

- Party Time! Everybody got down to the dance floor and dance the night away!
